lead_paragraph: Fred R. Conrad photographed 19th- and 20th-century subjects to emulate the work of Jacob Riis, using a 1950 plate camera to approximate Riis’s equipment.

headline.print_headline: The Other Half in Other Times

snippet: Fred R. Conrad photographed 19th- and 20th-century subjects to emulate the work of Jacob Riis, using a 1950 plate camera to approximate Riis’s equipment....
abstract: Fred R Conrad, inspired by 19th-century social reformer Jacob Riis, photographs scenes recreated from New York City's immigrant tenement history; uses 1950 plate camera and actors staged at Tenement Museum in Lower East Side.
